name: kidaptive-ui-base
description: A common starting point for react-based web apps, built using webpack

scripts.clean-full: rm -rf node_modules; npm ci; npm run clean
scripts.local: npm run clean; npm run test; webpack --config webpack.local.config.js
scripts.local-full: npm run clean-full; npm run local
scripts.dev: npm run clean; npm run test; webpack --config webpack.dev.config.js
scripts.dev-full: npm run clean-full; npm run dev
scripts.prod: npm run clean; npm run test; webpack -p --config webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.prod-full: npm run clean-full; npm run prod

author: byronbecker => <insert author name>
